name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente.
Meanwhile, fry pancetta in a pan until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated cheese, and black pepper.
Drain cooked spaghetti and add to the pan with pancetta, tossing to coat.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture, allowing the residual heat to cook the eggs without scrambling.
Serve immediately with extra grated cheese and black pepper.
